actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September annually as National Good Neighbor Day.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September annually as "National Good Neighbor Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September annually as National Good Neighbor Day.
